definition: to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)

sentences.english: Deaden the gnaw of hunger that way.
sentences.chinese: 借此来缓和一下饥饿的煎熬。

sentences.english: Let us use it to end AIDS – once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 让我们借此势头，去消灭艾滋病，将它斩草除根。

sentences.english: Every time Saturn moves through a house we learn a lesson pertaining to that house.
sentences.chinese: 每当土星走完一宫，我们便可以借此学到点什么。

sentences.english: We would like take the opportunity to thanks Y. B Wong Hong Wei for his presence to officially launched the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我们想借此机会感谢拿督王汉伟亲临及开幕此展览会。

sentences.english: We avail ourselves of this opportunity to express our heartful gratitude to you.
sentences.chinese: 我们借此机会向你们表示衷心的感谢。

sentences.english: I wish to take this opportunity to thank you all.
sentences.chinese: 我愿借此机会向大家表示感谢。

sentences.english: Metaphor is a manner which old experiences are used to substitute new experiences.
sentences.chinese: 隐喻利用旧经验说明新经验，是一种借此喻彼的方式。

sentences.english: Some bloggers even took the chance to send New Year wishes to Hu.
sentences.chinese: 有些用户甚至借此机会向胡锦涛主席送出新年祝福。

sentences.english: I also take this occasion to extend to China our sincerest gratitude for the enormous opportunities Expo2010 offers the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 借此机会，我还要向中国表示最诚挚的感谢。

sentences.english: So the religious practice on the deathbed person and after the death is based on the theory of the religious life.
sentences.chinese: 而宗教的临终法事及终后法事皆借此理论而建立。

sentences.english: Let me take this opportunity to express, once again, our sincere thanks to the Canadian government and people.
sentences.chinese: 借此机会，我愿再次向加拿政府和人民表示衷心感谢。

sentences.english: Maybe check out some editorial reviews that you can “borrow” to make it appear that you know what you are talking about.
sentences.chinese: 也许查查社评，你可以借此表明你知道你在说什么。

sentences.english: Therefore, the five-shaft spray coating equipment can achieve the multi-direction and multi-position spray coating effects.
sentences.chinese: 借此达到多方向及多位置的喷涂效果。

sentences.english: So take this quiz to find out if you will get promoted.
sentences.chinese: 因此，借此测验看看你是否会得到晋升。

sentences.english: By availing this opportunity, I would like to briefly introduce the situation in Jinhua.
sentences.chinese: 借此机会，我简要介绍一下金华的情况。

definition: so as to/for the purpose of/in order to
to draw support from/with the help of
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
to borrow sth for another use/to borrow an idea for one's own use
to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
to try hard to/to strive to
